info.name: Tumblr Image Width: No Rescaling
info.description: Keeps all tumblr photoset images/gifs at their true size. No upscaling from 500px to 540px. No shrinking from 540px to 500px. Based in part off this script
info.additionalInfo:
Updated Dec 11, 2015

Updated Jan 7, 2015
--
Tested in Google Chrome and Firefox

data.title: The script stopped working like before
No longer supports 3 images in a row
